ProductInfo.Features:
1) Network: GSM900/1800/1900MHZ 2) Single SIM Card Single Standby 3) Display Size: 1.5 inch TFT touch screen, resolution: 160x128 4) Support Bluetooth function
5) Inside memory: 55K, Support TF card and up to 2GB 6) Support MP3 & MP4 player 7) Connectivity: GPRS / WAP 8) Messaging: SMS, MMS
9) Data transfer: USB cable / Bluetooth 10) Support Games function 11) Audio File format: MP3 / MIDI 12) Video File format: 3GP / MPEG4
13) Image File format: JPEG / BMP / GIF 14) E-book format: TXT 15) Other functions: Calendar, Tasks, Alarm, Calculator, E-book reader, Currency Converter, Sound Recorder 16) Languages (option): a) English, Chinese Simplified, Chinese Traditional b) English, Arabic, Greek, German, Indonesian, Persian, Polish, Portuguese, Spanish c) English, French, German, Italian, Greek, Malay, Portuguese, Spanish, Russian d) English, French, Vietnamese, Thai, Greek, Swedish, Turkish odd, Danish
17) Battery: 3.7V/350mAh Li-ion battery 18) Dimensions: 245x45x13mm 19) Weight: 53g(Including battery)
